name: consumer_phone_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool data_axle_consumer_phone_search.
Tool description: Find relevant people in real-time.
API description: Search for people in the Data Axle database based on the provided criteria.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

packages.description: The data packages or filters to apply to the search.

query.description: The phone number to search for. Defaults to '(206) 555-1212'.
